about_the_game:
The Game will be released in early access both with a Free Demo and pay-able game.

Both contains the same content!

Both the Demo and the pay-able option contains the same content and will do so for a while.

We will update them both until the Demo is a good representation for the game.

Test the Demo! - Like the idea and the potential?

Wishlist it and follow along for the updates!

(You can, if you want to, buy the game in these early stages and it will all go in to the development of the game.)

If you do leave a review, which we are very grateful for!, - do remember that it is VERY Early access; there is a lower amount of content and there are bugs, so be a little nice okay? With that said, we will gladly read your comments about your experience, thoughts, hopes and bugs you encountered, so that we can utilize it to improve the game! Be it here in the steam forums or in our Discord channel.

Blessed Curse is a 4-player, online co-op, psychological horror game. You and your team of paranormal investigators will receive rumors of haunted locations. Search, investigate, explore these Japanese themed locations and utilize your entity-hunting equipment with friends, to try and gather as much evidence as you can. Unknown entities does not like to expose them selves, so it is up to you to figure out what might be lurking beneath the surface..

  • Immersive Experience: Tools, gadgets and a minimal user interface will help you to immersive yourself in to the Japanese environments.

  • Unique Ghosts: Identify entities, each with unique traits, personalities, and abilities to make each excursion feel different from the last.

  • Equipment: Use equipment inspired from traditional Japanese tools to locate and identify the entities.

  • Teamwork: Work together to figure out the right entity and to ensure everyone's survival.

  • Custom Difficulty: Create your own games to tailor the difficulty to your or your group's needs, with proportional rewards and come up with crazy game modes of your own!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not suitable for all ages: Blood, Violence, Suicide, General Mature Content
